title.rendered: LAMA Bluetooth Headphones In Ear 5.1 Waterproof Touch Earbuds Sport Headset Wireless Earphones with Charging Box…

content.rendered:
Colour Name:Bluetooth 5.1 White

Lama Bluetooth 5.1 headphones.

Technical information:
Name: LL01
Bluetooth model: 5.1
Material: aluminium alloy, PC
Charging Port: Type C
Headphone battery capability: 25 mAh.
Charging field battery capability: 320 mAh.
Charging time: approx. 70-80 minutes.
Playing time: approx. 2.5 hours.
Playtime with charging field: 15 hours.
Distance: 12 m (barrier-free).
Weight: 43 g.
Single bundle weight: 149g
Charging field dimension: 46.5 x 48.8 x 25 mm.

Compatible Devices
All Bluetooth-enabled computer systems, tablets, cell phones.

How to make use of:
Music:
Play/Pause: Touch as soon as
Previous/subsequent music: contact left / proper thrice
Volume -/+: contact twice left/proper
Call:
Answer: Touch as soon as
Hang up: contact twice

Sound:
Turn off:
Successfully coupled: tuten
Low battery alarm.

Lighting:
Charging standing of the charging field: crimson mild flashes.
Fully charged: the crimson mild lights up.

Package contains:
2 x Bluetooth headphones.
1 x charging field.
Type C charging cable x 1.
6 x ear plugs.
Instructions x 1.

Service:
All LAMA merchandise come with a 12-month guarantee. If there’s a downside with the product, please contact us instantly and we are going to assist you clear up it.

Make certain this matches by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Bluetooth 5.1 headphones: decrease energy consumption, sooner transmission speeds and the transmission stage reaches the lossless stage, so the sound high quality is clearer. 3D stereo for immersive listening. The connection is steady and the left and proper headphones are routinely paired. Widely suitable with a wide range of Bluetooth-enabled computer systems, cell phones and so forth. Compatible with iOS, Android, Windows.
Intelligent contact management: the Bluetooth earbuds could be simply managed by tapping with out having to press exhausting. This reduces the harm to the ear by urgent strongly. Responsive and simple to make use of.
Automatic energy on and connection: open the charging case, the Bluetooth headphones will routinely activate and join in accordance with the newest pairing recording.
Matte Texture: The charging field and earphones of this Bluetooth headphones have been frosted and the hand feels delicate. Classic model, beautiful and compact, very handy to hold.
Comfortable to put on: Ergonomic in-ear design. 3 sizes of silicone earplugs meet the necessities of various ears. Mini and small, simple to hold.

excerpt.rendered:
Make sure this fits by entering your model number.
Bluetooth 5.1 headphones: lower power consumption, faster transmission speeds and the transmission level reaches the lossless level, so the sound quality is clearer. 3D stereo for immersive listening. The connection is stable and the left and right headphones are automatically paired. Widely compatible with a variety of Bluetooth-enabled computers, mobile phones etc. Compatible with iOS, Android, Windows.
